JobFullDesc: Recruitment Brand, Lead Specialist Think a Big Four career is just spreadsheets, gray suits, and corporate profits? Look again. Deloitte's full-service Marketing Excellence (ME) organization is seeking collaborative creatives, skillful strategists, and marketing masterminds to lead our businesses in exciting new directions. If you're a marketing and communications professional who sees the world differently, finds opportunity where others don't, and keeps a pulse on the next big trends, then become our partner in growth. Together we'll discover new ways to transform out-of-the-box ideas into measurable business results for our clients and our organization. If you're ready to make an impact, join our team to see how we Deloitte differently.Position summaryAs a recruitment brand and marketing lead specialist, you'll lead the execution of recruitment brand and marketing programs to support the business' hiring needs, including recruitment activities that reinforce Deloitte's Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) commitments. You'll provide strategic guidance and brand support to leadership and recruiting professionals through a wide range of marketing activities that strengthen the relationship between recruiters and target candidates. Excellent strategic thinking, project management, communication skills and marketing experience will be critical to success in this role.Work you'll do: Collaborate with internal stakeholder in the U.S. to help execute the recruitment brand strategy and plan in support of campus and experienced hire recruiting efforts. Partner with Deloitte's DEI national recruitment team to create materials for key priorities, such as conferences, leadership programs, external channels like Glassdoor and Fairygodboss; ensure Deloitte's DEI recruitment messaging is consistent across key channels and communications.Manage and drive the creation of key assets, such as careers site content, social media campaigns and video, that support the promotion of Deloitte's brand for hiring needs related to our core businesses, specialties and growth areas. Collaborate with the recruitment brand and marketing team members to identify new creative and innovative ways to highlight Deloitte's professionals, our culture, DE&I stories, etc. Understand and advise stakeholders and others on the Deloitte master brand, visual identity, brand personality and more to ensure alignment with our brand.Build and maintain relationships across the organization to help forge stronger partnerships with key teams, better understand the hiring landscape and inform team priorities. Maintain and update key technology tools and templates so that recruiters have access to the latest materials. Continually scan the talent marketplace for best practices, innovative tools and new approaches to recruitment brand that are emerging in the US and globally. Help translate data and analytics into recommendations to fuel continuous improvement. QualificationsRequiredBachelor's degree in business, marketing, communications or related field or equivalent working experience5+ years' experience in brand, marketing, communications, and project management with knowledge of marketing strategy, campaigns and tacticsDemonstrated knowledge of and passion for diversity, equity and inclusion initiativesSocial media experience including fluency in social media strategies, platforms and metrics for LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTubeCreative problem solver with exceptional communication skills (research, writing, editing, presentation and speaking)Comfortable with a range of technology from Microsoft office products to project management software to recruitment and marketing tools Ability to work and manage multiple projects effectively in a fast-paced, innovative environment Previous experience working with a marketing/creative agency a plusHow You'll GrowAt Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there is always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs at Deloitte University, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career. Explore Deloitte University, The Leadership Center.
